body_html:
Can you try updating Bazel to 0.2.3?

Can you upload the file under bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cc/CROSSTOOL?
What if you try with --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:raw-toolchain?

body:
Can you try updating Bazel to 0.2.3?

Can you upload the file under bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cc/CROSSTOOL?
What if you try with `--crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:raw-toolchain`?
